description:
Magic is a fast & customizable life counting tool for Magic: The Gathering (MTG) with one motto in mind - "Keep it simple, keep it clean".

Current Features:
- Duel Mode
- Free For All Mode (Up to 8 Players)
- Two Headed Giant Mode
- Selectable Deck Colour Per Player
- Selectable Backdrop 
- Disable Screen-Sleep Preferences 
- Selectable - / + Postions 
- Selectable Loss/Gain Values
- Advanced Health Mode
- Logging
- Poison Counters

Upcoming Features:
- Phone Wallpaper as Available Backdrop
- Sound/Vibrate Preferences
- Emperor Game Mode
- Just Type Rule Search (in-app)

To request additional features please write in the review section what you would like to see and why!
